description: This file contains style definitions for an Angular frontend component, focusing on layout and responsive design.

classes.name: topbar
classes.description: Styles for the top navigation bar, including flexbox layout and spacing.

classes.name: brand
classes.description: Styles for the branding section within the topbar, including alignment and gap management.

classes.name: logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo, setting its font size.

classes.name: title
classes.description: Styles for the title within the topbar, emphasizing font weight.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Styles for the control section within the topbar, managing layout and alignment.

classes.name: layout
classes.description: Styles for overall layout of content, utilizing a grid-based design.

classes.name: game
classes.description: Styles for the game area, managing padding and overflow.

classes.name: side
classes.description: Styles for the side section, including padding.
